General.Name: Wheels India Limited
General.Description: Wheels India Limited, together with its subsidiary, engages in the manufacture and sale of automotive and industrial components in India and internationally. It offers steel, cast aluminum, forged aluminum, and wire wheel for use in passenger and light cargo vehicle, trucks, trailers, buses, agriculture and farm equipment, and defense vehicles; off-road vehicles; vehicle chassis and suspensions; wind turbines; fabricated and precision products for construction, mining vehicle, and other equipment; hydraulic cylinders for energy equipment and off-road vehicles. The company was incorporated in 1960 and is headquartered in Chennai, India.
